mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.qc_no AS "qcNo", a.qc_phase AS "qcPhase", a.status AS "status", a.audit_status AS "auditStatus", a.owner_code AS "ownerCode", a.priority AS "priority", a.order_type AS "orderType", a.order_no AS "orderNo", a.order_time AS "orderTime", a.fm_etq AS "fmEtq", a.to_etq AS "toEtq", a.audit_op AS "auditOp", a.audit_time AS "auditTime", a.def1 AS "def1", a.def2 AS "def2", a.def3 AS "def3", a.def4 AS "def4", a.def5 AS "def5", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.rec_ver AS "recVer", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.org_id AS "orgId"
LEFT JOIN sys_office so on a.org_id = so.id LEFT JOIN sys_user creater on creater.id = a.create_by LEFT JOIN sys_user updater on updater.id = a.update_by
mapper.select:
SELECT , ebcu.ebcu_name_cn AS ownerName FROM wm_qc_header a LEFT JOIN eb_customer ebcu ON a.owner_code = ebcu.ebcu_customer_no AND a.org_id = ebcu.org_id AND ebcu.ebcu_type LIKE '%OWNER,%'
WHERE a.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO wm_qc_header( id, qc_no, qc_phase, status, audit_status, owner_code, priority, order_type, order_no, order_time, fm_etq, to_etq, audit_op, audit_time, def1, def2, def3, def4, def5, remarks, rec_ver, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag, org_id ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{qcNo}, #{qcPhase}, #{status}, #{auditStatus}, #{ownerCode}, #{priority}, #{orderType}, #{orderNo}, #{orderTime}, #{fmEtq}, #{toEtq}, #{auditOp}, #{auditTime}, #{def1}, #{def2}, #{def3}, #{def4}, #{def5}, #{remarks}, #{recVer}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag}, #{orgId} )
mapper.update: UPDATE wm_qc_header SET qc_no = #{qcNo}, qc_phase = #{qcPhase}, status = #{status}, audit_status = #{auditStatus}, owner_code = #{ownerCode}, priority = #{priority}, order_type = #{orderType}, order_no = #{orderNo}, order_time = #{orderTime}, fm_etq = #{fmEtq}, to_etq = #{toEtq}, audit_op = #{auditOp}, audit_time = #{auditTime}, def1 = #{def1}, def2 = #{def2}, def3 = #{def3}, def4 = #{def4}, def5 = #{def5}, remarks = #{remarks}, rec_ver = #{recVer} + 1, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, org_id = #{orgId} WHERE id = #{id} AND rec_ver = #{recVer}

UPDATE wm_qc_header wqh SET wqh.status = ( SELECT CASE WHEN MIN(wqd.status) = '20' THEN '20' WHEN MIN(wqd.status) = '10' THEN '10' WHEN (MAX(wqd.status) = '10' OR MAX(wqd.status) = '20') AND MIN(wqd.status) = '00' THEN '10' ELSE '00' END status FROM wm_qc_detail wqd WHERE 1 = 1 AND wqd.status NOT IN ('99', '90') AND wqd.qc_no = #{qcNo} AND wqd.org_id = #{orgId} ) WHERE wqh.qc_no = #{qcNo} AND wqh.org_id = #{orgId}
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM wm_qc_header a
a.id IN
#{qcId}
